intro: Dimerostemma matogrossense, commonly known as the Matogrossense dimerostemma, is a flowering plant native to Brazil. It belongs to the family Apocynaceae, which includes milkweeds and related species. The plant is characterized by its erect stems and opposite, ovate leaves with serrated edges. Its flowers are typically clustered in umbels and feature showy, pinkish-white petals. Dimerostemma matogrossense is often found in tropical and subtropical regions, growing in open woodlands and disturbed soils.
